I would really like this feature, I play on playstation and I can't export my world. Like, If I cannot play ever again on playstation how can I have my world saved to put it on another device? Making that it can be imported on java would be really good.

I really like this idea. I have Minecraft Bedrock on my phone and I'd like to have a backup of my worlds in case something happens. I don't want to struggle with thousands of tutorials that I always try and none of them are successful, I don't understand why they haven't made this accessible yet.

Netherite wasn't that long ago, and the warden is the only "too strong" mob, intentionally for it to not be battled.

Um... what? I don't know about you, but once I get fully enchanted diamond armor (not even Netherite, just diamond) I'm nearly invincible. Not to mention when I also have totems of undying... Mobs like Piglin Brutes, Vindicators, Evokers, and Ravagers are pretty strong, I'll admit, but those are all easily avoidable and not as strong as a single Wither (which aren't that difficult tbh).

If it's too hard, play on a lower difficulty. It'll decrease the amount of damage the enemies do. If it's still too hard... then well, I don't really know what to say. :/
